benchmark_details.name: SPACE-IDEAS: A Dataset for Salient Information Detection in Space
benchmark_details.overview: SPACE-IDEAS is a dataset for salient information detection from innovation ideas related to the Space domain. It's manually annotated using a methodology that ensures high-quality annotations, and includes an extended version annotated using a large generative language model.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To create a dataset for detecting salient information in the context of innovation ideas in the Space domain.

data.source: Ideas submitted to the Open Space Innovation Platform (OSIP).
data.annotation: Manually annotated and also annotated via a generative language model (gpt-3.5-turbo).

methodology.interpretation: Higher F1 score indicates better classification performance.
methodology.validation: Hold out 20% of the SPACE-IDEAS dataset for testing.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Only includes text from ideas explicitly marked by the authors as non-confidential.
